articles.description: Manchester United are 14th in the Premier League and seven points above the bottom three, but could they really be relegated?
articles.title: Manchester United: Ruben Amorim senses danger, but is Premier League relegation battle really possible?

articles.description: Plymouth Argyle have parted company with Wayne Rooney following the side's defeat to Oxford United.
articles.title: Wayne Rooney leaves Plymouth Argyle with side bottom of Championship

articles.description: Matching Ricky Ponting and beating Steve Smith, those close to Sam Konstas tell BBC Sport about his journey to international cricket.
articles.title: Sam Konstas: Teenage Australia opener's journey to India Test in Melbourne

articles.description: West Ham striker Michail Antonio is discharged from hospital more than three weeks after sustaining a broken leg in a car accident.
articles.title: Michail Antonio: West Ham striker discharged from hospital three weeks after breaking leg in car accident

articles.description: Detroit Lions quarterback Jared Goff throws three touchdown passes during his side's 40-34 win against the San Francisco 49ers.
articles.title: Jared Goff stars in Detroit Lions' win against San Francisco 49ers

articles.description: Teenager Luke Littler survives a massive scare but beats Ryan Joyce 4-3 to reach the quarter-finals of the PDC World Darts Championship.
articles.title: PDC World Darts Championship 2025 results: Luke Littler survives scare to reach quarter-finals

articles.description: West Ham captain Jarrod Bowen is set for a spell on the sidelines after suffering a fractured foot in Sunday's Premier League game against Liverpool.
articles.title: Jarrod Bowen: West Ham captain suffers fractured foot in Liverpool defeat

articles.description: The January transfer window is a notoriously tricky time to do business. BBC Sport has taken a closer look at five high-profile players whose futures are likely to come under scrutiny over the next month.
articles.title: January transfer window: Who could be on the move before deadline day?

articles.description: Israeli players are banned from competing in next month's World Indoor Bowls Championships.
articles.title: Israeli bowlers banned from World Indoor Championships

articles.description: It is 50 years since Manchester United were relegated, but boss Ruben Amorim says it is "a possibility" that history could repeat itself.
articles.title: Manchester United: Relegation 'a possibility' says Ruben Amorim
